title: Devaki
occurrences: Hello Devaki, you have only two days of time left
-What is your name? -Devaki
Hello Devaki, I'm Kishore Sinha's wife
-Yes, tell me-Devaki got consciousness
-Collect Devaki's number from writer -Okay sir
-Hello sir -Devaki, where are you?
-Good afternoon, reception-Hello Devaki, this is Puneet
-Why did you call? -I love you Devaki!
Look Devaki, I've fallen for your beauty
Sorry sir, he has misguided you regarding Devaki
Devaki is a nice woman, I know her since few years
So, we used to visit orphanage very often, there we met Devaki
Within few days, Devaki became very close to us
Along with Devaki, Aradhya was also coming to our house
Devaki, you said you want to talk something, please tell
What are you saying Devaki? Are you serious?
Devaki, don't mistake me, do you have any financial problem?
Hello doctor, I'm Devaki
Look Devaki, as a friend I would suggest you only one thing
Previous day I had called and messaged Devaki, but she didn't answer
Devaki, did you find Aradhya?
For a childless couple like us, Devi has given you in the form of Devaki
